definition: thick paste of fermented soybean/marinated in soy paste/paste/jam

sentences.english: The vegetable skewer's saving grace is the Yakitori sauce.
sentences.chinese: 日式串烧的酱料可说是蔬菜串烧的救星。

sentences.english: All Japanese pork chop specialist will have you ground your own sesame to make the sauce.
sentences.chinese: 所有日色猪扒店都会要你自己磨芝麻做酱料。

sentences.english: The silk floss padding can prevent the soy paste from contamination.
sentences.chinese: 丝棉就可以让里面的酱料免受外界的污染了。

sentences.english: Classic Buffalo-style chicken wing sauce is composed of 2 ingredients: a vinegar-based cayenne pepper hot sauce and butter.
sentences.chinese: 经典水牛炸翅的腌制酱料是混合醋和黄油的辣椒沙司。

sentences.english: The sauce packs a punch with a sweet and spicy mix that will make Dad's mouth water.
sentences.chinese: 特殊的酱料带来了甜辣组合的口味会令爸爸口水直流。

sentences.english: The bread was lightly coated with an olive oil dressing.
sentences.chinese: 面包涂有薄薄的橄榄油酱料。

sentences.english: You then dip them in a little bowl of special sauce.
sentences.chinese: 然后把它们在一个小碗特制的酱料。

sentences.english: Stay away from entrees with heavy sauces.
sentences.chinese: 不要吃添有大量酱料的主菜。

sentences.english: Marinara sauce is one of the most popular sauces here.
sentences.chinese: 大蒜番茄是这里最受欢迎的酱料之一。

sentences.english: Marinated chicken dark meat, grilled and served with spicy and sour sauce.
sentences.chinese: 精选上等去骨鸡腿肉，以独门酱料腌渍后，上架薰烤。

sentences.english: The shrimp come freeze-dried, and the spicy cocktail sauce arrives as a powder.
sentences.chinese: 虾是冻干的，而芬芳的酱料呈粉状。

sentences.english: What kind of dressing do you want on your salad?
sentences.chinese: 色拉要淋上哪种酱料呢？

sentences.english: Crispy lettuce, grilled strips of chicken thigh, tossed in our delicious homemade sweet soy sauce.
sentences.chinese: 以生菜铺底，配以嫩滑的鸡肉和自制的酱料。

sentences.english: Crispy lettuce, grilled boneless chicken , tossed in our delicious homemade sauce.
sentences.chinese: 以生菜铺底，配以嫩滑的鸡肉和自制的酱料。

sentences.english: Hong Kong & Kowloon Sauce & Preserved-Fruit Amalgamated Employers Association.
sentences.chinese: 香港九龙酱料凉果联合商会。

definition: raw materials for making soup/packaged soup mix
ingredients (in a cooking recipe)/to mix materials according to directions
